description: This is a combined requirement for the supply, labor, equipment, and materials to replace the roof shingles of building two of the Archambault minimum institution.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal (RFP)

* **Title (English/French):** Roof Replacement – Building 2/Réfection de la toiture – Bâtiment 2
* **Reference Number (English/French):** cb-5147-42675479
* **Tender ID:** 21301-24-4393579
* **Close Date:** June 15, 2023, 14:00:00

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites interested suppliers to submit a proposal for the replacement of the roof shingles on building 2 of the Archambault Minimum institution.

## Project Description

The project includes the supply, labor, equipment, and materials to replace the roof shingles on building 2. The work must be completed within 17 weeks of acceptance of the contract.

## Mandatory Site Visit

A mandatory site visit is scheduled for June 6, 2023, at 10:00 a.m. at the Correctional Service of Canada, Archambault Minimum Institution, 244, Boul. Gibson, Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines (Québec) J5N 1V8. Suppliers must confirm their attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend by June 2, 2023, at 10:00 a.m.

## Procurement Method

This procurement will be conducted using the Request for Proposal (RFP) method, with the lowest priced compliant bid being the selection criterion.

## Requirements and Information

*   **Unspsc Code(s):** 72120000, 72152600, 72152601
*   **Language of Bid:** English or French
*   **Contact Information:**

    Karine Clément, Contracting and Procurement Regional Officer
    Phone: 514-235-8177
    Email: [Karina.Clement@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto: Karine.Clement@csc-scc.gc.ca)
*   **Documentation:**

    Suppliers must download the solicitation document and associated documents from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders. 
*   **Security Requirements:**

    This contract does not include security requirements.
*   **Estimated Quantity of Commodities:**

    Suppliers can refer to the solicitation document for further details.

## Evaluation Criteria

The procurement will be evaluated based on the responsiveness of submissions, and the lowest priced compliant bid will be selected.

*   The CSC reserves
